title: Get to Know Uchiura!
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>Ah, I’m glad you came here today, Lanzhu-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Thanks for inviting me, Kanan. So, where are we going today? An Aqours practice session? Lanzhu wants to see it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Yup, yup. Of course, of course. But that comes afterward. First, you have to see what Uchiura has to offer.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Uchiura?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Yup. Each and every one of us lives here, and our fans here are our biggest supporters. But—<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>I got it! In order to understand Aqours, you first have to understand Uchiura, right!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Yup, I couldn’t have said it better myself~ So let me introduce our pride and joy, Uchiura! The mountains and the sea, no matter your preference, are the best here!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Kyaah! Lanzhu is excited to see both! Where are we going first?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Let’s start with the sea first! Let’s get to the boat!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Awesome! We’re going on a cruise~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
